item.title: Is Trump taking too much aspirin? Here's what experts say
item.description: Trump takes four times the recommended dose of aspirin for cardiac prevention. Even low-dose aspirin is no longer recommended for people over 60 who don't have heart disease.
item.content:encoded:
Trump takes four times the recommended dose of aspirin for cardiac prevention. Even low-dose aspirin is no longer recommended for people over 60 who don't have heart disease.

(Image credit: Evan Vucci)

item.title: Trump vows to 'rescue' Iran's protesters. Iran warns the U.S. to stay out of it

item.title: U.S. interventions in Latin America and the Caribbean haven't always gone as planned
item.description: President Trump's pressure campaign against Venezuela is the latest in a long saga of U.S. intervention in the region that is rooted in the 1823 Monroe Doctrine — and is a mix of success and failure.
